TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Charles_Savarin, title = Charles_Savarin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Savarin} }

S.FORM: Charles Savarin 10 a ulad 2 da emiad, Charles Savarin, u misingkiway. 1943 a mihcaan nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Dominica ayza sa ci Charles Savarin, micakat a demiad sa i 2013 a mihca 10 bulad 2 demiad.

Charles Savarin 10 a olad 2 da emiad, Charles Savarin, o misingkiway. 1943 a mihcaan nalecohan. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Dominica ayza sa ci Charles Savarin, micakat a demiad sa i 2013 a mihca 10 bolad 2 demiad.
